title: Volcano Type
content:
**Volcano Type**

Volcano Type is a small, independant type foundry in Karlsruhe, Germany. The foundry is run by the graphic design studio [FINEST MAGMA](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416031830/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FINEST%20MAGMA), who also organize the German-language type blog, [Slanted](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416031830/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Slanted).

[http://www.volcano-type.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416031830/http:/www.volcano-type.de/ "http://www.volcano-type.de")
author: dan_reynolds
